title: Requirement Analysis
description: Collaborated with functional consultants to translate business requirements for a modern Trade Promotion Management (TPM) dashboard into technical specifications, emphasizing Fiori Elements and embedded analytics.
technologiesUsed: SAP Fiori Elements, CDS Views

title: Core Data Services Development
description: Developed consumption and composite CDS Views (ZCDS_VIT_PROMO_ANALYTICS) that unified data from Sales Documents (VBAP), Billing Documents (VBRK), and Condition Records to provide real-time insights into promotion effectiveness.
technologiesUsed: ABAP CDS, ADT, @UI Annotations, @Consumption Annotations

title: RAP Business Object Development
description: Built RAP-based Fiori Elements App 'Manage Customer Rebate Agreements' using Managed Scenario with Behavior Definition, Validations for budgetary limits, simulateSettlement action, and automatic accrual determinations.
technologiesUsed: ABAP RESTful Programming Model, Behavior Definitions, Actions, Validations, Determinations

title: Clean Core Extensibility
description: Used Key User Extensibility to add Z_Promo_Campaign_ID field to sales orders and In-App Extensibility for Fiori UI. Developed Side-by-Side Extension on SAP BTP (CAP/Node.js) for complex multi-tiered promotion calculations.
technologiesUsed: Key User Extensibility, In-App Extensibility, SAP BTP, CAP, Node.js, OData

title: Integration Development
description: Used SAP Cloud Integration (CPI) to design iFlow for historical data migration from Oracle using OData APIs with data mapping and error logging.
technologiesUsed: SAP CPI, iFlow, OData, Data Migration

title: Custom Code Analysis
description: Led analysis using ABAP Test Cockpit (ATC) with S/4HANA Readiness Check. Categorized findings from Simplification Database including obsolete CLIENT additions and classic tables like BSID vs ACDOCA.
technologiesUsed: ABAP Test Cockpit, ATC, S/4HANA Readiness Check, Simplification Database

title: Code Remediation
description: Converted legacy SELECT * FROM BSEG report to use CDS Views (I_JournalEntryItem) and AMDP for complex profit-center-wise reconciliation logic. Replaced direct table updates with released BAPIs.
technologiesUsed: CDS Views, AMDP, BAPIs, ABAP-OO

title: ALV to Analytical Query Migration
description: Rewrote custom ALV output for material ledger analysis using Analytical Query service and Analytical CDS View with dimensions and measures.
technologiesUsed: Analytical CDS Views, Analytical Query, @Analytics Annotations

title: HANA Optimization
description: Fixed performance bottlenecks by replacing nested SELECT loops with JOINs, introduced CODE PAL checks, and used EXPLAIN PLAN to verify HANA execution plans.
technologiesUsed: HANA, OpenSQL, CODE PAL, SQL Optimization

title: Data Model Alignment
description: Adapted custom Z-tables to use new S/4HANA data types (SSTRING) and ensured compatibility with Universal Journal (ACDOCA).
technologiesUsed: ABAP Dictionary, ACDOCA, Universal Journal

title: Global Template Development
description: Developed RAP-based Fiori App for global intercompany cost allocation posting using Fiori Elements (List Report & Object Page). Implemented validations for sender/receiver cost centers belonging to different company codes.
technologiesUsed: RAP, Fiori Elements, List Report, Object Page, Validations

title: Italian Localization Carry-Forward
description: Analyzed and adapted existing enhancement implementations (BADIs) for FatturaPA XML generation (BADI_DOCUMENT_CHANGE) and SDI transmission. Wrapped in extension-enabled classes.
technologiesUsed: BADI, Enhancement Framework, FatturaPA, XML

title: Spanish VAT BTP Extension
description: Built standalone SAP Build Apps application on BTP consuming S/4HANA OData services (A_RegulativeReportingResult) for Spanish VAT reporting with country-specific calculations.
technologiesUsed: SAP BTP, Build Apps, OData, Spanish VAT

title: Integration Configuration
description: Configured and monitored IDoc flows for migrated localized processes ensuring seamless communication with external tax authority systems.
technologiesUsed: IDocs, IDoc Monitoring, Integration

title: GST Field Extensions
description: Extended standard SAP Fiori 'Manage Journal Entries' app using In-App Extensibility to capture mandatory Indian GST fields (GSTIN, HSN Code, Place of Supply). Created CDS View extensions for I_GLAccountLineItem entity.
technologiesUsed: In-App Extensibility, CDS View Extensions, Fiori Elements

title: Form Development
description: Developed Adobe Forms and Smart Forms for Indian GST invoices (GSTR-1) and e-way bills by extending standard SAPscript forms using text modules and programming logic for tax calculations.
technologiesUsed: Adobe Forms, Smart Forms, SAPscript, Tax Calculation

title: Analytical Reporting
description: Created custom Analytical CDS View with India-GST dimensions (State, Tax Code) and exposed via OData service to power SAP Analytics Cloud story for Indian finance team.
technologiesUsed: Analytical CDS, OData, SAP Analytics Cloud, India GST

title: Payroll Integration
description: Built CPI iFlow to extract payroll results from SAP HR formatted for Indian third-party payroll provider with data privacy masking.
technologiesUsed: SAP CPI, iFlow, HR Payroll, Data Masking

title: Cloud Compliance Code Scan
description: Used CL_ABAP_SOURCE_SCAN to find and refactor code using hardcoded file paths, direct OS commands, and unsupported function modules.
technologiesUsed: ABAP Cloud, CL_ABAP_SOURCE_SCAN, Code Remediation

title: BTP Object Store Integration
description: Replaced file system operations with BTP Object Store APIs and approved cloud-ready APIs.
technologiesUsed: SAP BTP, Object Store API, ABAP Cloud

title: Self-Service Configuration
description: Configured SSCUI (Self-Service Configuration UI) for business users to maintain simple configuration post-go-live, reducing IT dependency.
technologiesUsed: SSCUI, Self-Service, Configuration

title: Performance Baseline Analysis
description: Used SQL Monitor (ST05) and Runtime Analysis (SAT) to identify long-running jobs pre-migration and establish performance baselines.
technologiesUsed: ST05, SAT, SQL Monitor, Performance Analysis

title: Critical Report Optimization
description: Rewrote month-end sales aggregation report using CDS Views and pushed calculations to HANA layer in Azure, reducing runtime from 4 hours to 15 minutes.
technologiesUsed: CDS Views, HANA Optimization, Azure, Performance Tuning

title: Salesforce OData Services
description: Developed OData services in S/4HANA (using Service Binding in ADT) to expose Customer, Material, and Sales Order data.
technologiesUsed: OData, Service Binding, ADT, ABAP

title: Integration Suite Development
description: Built iFlow on SAP Integration Suite using OData receiver adapter to call Salesforce REST APIs with comprehensive error handling and Message Mapping using Groovy Script.
technologiesUsed: SAP Integration Suite, CPI, iFlow, Groovy, Message Mapping

title: AWS S3 Integration
description: Created Restful ABAP Programming (RAP) service with uploadAttachment action. Implementation called ABAP HTTP client to push files to AWS S3 bucket via signed URLs.
technologiesUsed: RAP, HTTP Client, AWS S3, REST API

title: RAP Business Object Creation
description: Analyzed legacy Z-tables and built new RAP Business Object (ZR_EQUIPMENT_MAINT) with root and composition child node for maintenance history using Managed Scenario with draft.
technologiesUsed: RAP, Business Objects, Managed Scenario, Draft

title: Fiori Elements App Generation
description: Generated Fiori Elements List Report & Object Page app by binding to RAP service OData endpoint. Used Annotations Local File (manifest.json) to customize UI.
technologiesUsed: Fiori Elements, List Report, Object Page, manifest.json

title: Geolocation Integration
description: Integrated sap.m.VBox with JavaScript to render map (using Leaflet) plotting technician location on Object Page.
technologiesUsed: UI5, JavaScript, Leaflet, Geolocation

title: Document AI Integration
description: Implemented action to upload maintenance photo triggering SAP BTP Document Information Extraction (DoX) service to read text from images (serial numbers) and propose for data entry.
technologiesUsed: SAP BTP, Document Information Extraction, DoX, AI

title: Fiori Launchpad Configuration
description: Configured new app in SAP Fiori Launchpad creating catalog, group, and role assignment for maintenance team.
technologiesUsed: Fiori Launchpad, Catalogs, Roles
